channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1608; 09:17PM; 1512 N Las Palmas Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/44vhcSZ; Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes with no injuries reported. There was a well developed attic fire which crews prevented from extending down into the structure. While fire attack made entry to the attic space, firefighters conducted salvage operations to protect the belongings inside the structure. The building, appearing as a single family dwelling, was housing a commercial business. No further details.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E76 E82 RA76 T27 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1608; 08:58PM; 1457 N Las Palmas Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OkINAF; Hollywood; One story, single family dwelling with smoke showing, possible attic fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E76 E82 RA76 T27 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

title.a: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire 07/19/2023 INC#0784

item.description: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire; INC#0784; 12:48PM; 13235 Golden State Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/46UISCm; Sylmar; Three engines will handle the incident, canceling the rest of the brush response. They have stopped forward progress and will continue to address hotspots and ensure the fire is fully extinguished. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E290 E298 E7 E75 E87 E90 E91 E98 EM17 FR91 H2 H4 H7 HA2 HA4 HA7 RA18 T90 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0784; 12:25PM; 13200 Golden State Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pUyv0W; Sylmar; Approximately 1/4 of heavy brush with storage containers exposed (*at least* two but exact number unknown at this time). ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E290 E298 E7 E75 E87 E90 E91 E98 EM17 FR91 H2 H4 HA2 HA4 T90 T98; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#1661; 09:15PM; 12717 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/44wgPrw; Sylmar; Large, one story commercial building (DBA Big Lots) with an contents fire in one corner of the business with fire sprinkler activation. It was paper goods that were burning, creating a moderate amount of smoke inside. Firefighters ensured the fire was completely extinguished and then shut down the water to the sprinkler system. Firefighters will work to remove the standing water (estimated 1 1/2" in the back portion of the store) to preserve property. The 9-1-1 call was received at 8:55PM. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E75 E91 E98 RA891 RA91 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Technical Rescue; INC#0719; 11:27AM; 460 N Gaffey St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44w1dnJ; San Pedro; A construction crane overturned and two patients fell approximately 20'. There are no trapped patients and the technical rescue is canceled. The first units on scene will handle patient care (conditions unknown at this time). The impact of the crane on traffic is uknown and any questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 2002; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E112 E248 E285 E36 E85 EM6 H6 HA6 HR3 RA112 RA36 T48 T85 UR88; CH4; 13; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Structure Fire - FIRE OUT 07/18/2023 INC#0584

item.description: Update Structure Fire - FIRE OUT; INC#0584; 10:32AM; 15800 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q7DUwp; Van Nuys; Firefighters located and confirmed a fire out - there was a fully involved swamp cooler on the roof which employees extinguished. The fire did not extend into the structure and there are no injuries reported. One task force will handle, all other resources are released. No further details.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC15 CM40 CM42 E100 E103 E273 E275 E290 E81 EM12 RA90 T73 T75 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0584; 10:16AM; 15800 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/44M8Je0; Van Nuys; Very large, one story commercial building (DBA Anheuser-Busch) with smoke showing. Two additional task forces requested. Preliminary, unconfirmed reports state possible 'swamp cooler' fire on the roof. Firefighters are in the offensive mode working to locate the fire.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E103 E290 E81 RA90 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1732; 09:31PM; 8330 N Melvin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/43wWSj0; Northridge; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 21 minutes. The property owner confirmed the house was used for storage only and no one was inside. The fire was contained to the unit of origin and prevented from extending to the surrounding trees/vegetation and structures. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E103 E104 E107 E273 E73 RA104 T73; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1732; 09:25PM; 8330 N Melvin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/43wWSj0; Northridge; Firefighters are in the defensive mode. The building is a detached, single family home (approx 1400sq ft) at the back of a large property with excessive storage and several different structures. Firefighters immediately knocked down the flames putting the exposures at risk and are working to contain the fire and extinguish with no extension. ; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E103 E104 E273 E73 RA104 T73; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart
